Frequency once until recharged

Requirements You are in @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance}

You channel fire and water powers into your blade, then thrust your weapon rapidly. Make a ranged attack roll with your current weapon against a creature or unattended object within 60 feet of you. At level 8 and every 2 levels thereafter, increase the water and fire damage by 1d6 each.

You cannot use this ability again for [[/r 1d4 #Recharge Scalding Water Thrust]]{1d4 rounds}, determined upon using it.

Critical Success The target takes @Damage[(5 + (1 * (floor((@actor.level - 8)/2)) + 1))d6[water-ff]] damage and @Damage[(5 + (1 * (floor((@actor.level - 8)/2)) + 1))d6[fire]] damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you.

Success The target takes @Damage[(3 + (1 * (floor((@actor.level - 8)/2)) + 1))d6[water-ff]] damage and @Damage[(3 + (1 * (floor((@actor.level - 8)/2)) + 1))d6[fire]] damage and is pushed 5 feet away from you.
